law.catch_line: Cooperation with Department of Corrections -- Assistance in training.
law.text: The cabinet shall cooperate with the Department of Corrections in the development of regulations concerning the public health or health aspects of jails as defined in KRS 441.005 and shall assist in the training of jail inspectors employed by the Department of Corrections.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 77, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 385, sec. 35, effective July 1, 1982.

metadata.lrc-note: . We have been advised by the Legislative Research Commission staff person assigned to the drafting and review of 1982 Acts Chapter 385, that due to a clerical error, two different effective dates were included in Section 53 of this Act, both of which were applicable to this section, and that the correct date is July 1, 1982.
